questions.question:
What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    printf("%d", x - (x > 2 ? x : -x));
}

What is the value of x after the following code?

int x = 5;
x = x + x-- - x++;

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    printf("%d", x & -x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x ^= x ^ y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x += y-- + ++x;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 2;
    int y = 3;
    int z = x++ + ++y - x++;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 2;
    x *= y + 2;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    int z = (x &= y) || (y += x);
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 2;
    int y = 3;
    x = (x + 1) * (y++);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x / y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x / (y - 5);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 10;
    int z = x && y;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    int z = x || y;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 10;
    x += x + (y--, x++);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    int z = x++ - --y + x++;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 7;
    x = x | y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x ^= x & y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 7;
    x = (x & y) << 1;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x - y++ * x;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    int y = 2;
    x |= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}
